pages.text: The Cotton Candy Strain$(br2)Base THC: 19% $(br)Base CBD: 6% $(br)Effect: Chillout
cotton candy Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
cotton candy Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
cotton candy extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting cotton_candy Weed in an Extractor
You can package your cotton_candy weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
